text:
Notwithstanding any provision to the contrary in Sections 
4.2 through 
4.9, the Public Utilities Commission, the Recreation and Park Commission, the Airport Commission, the Port of San Francisco, the Health Commission and the Board of Trustees of the War Memorial shall have the exclusive right to arrange for the installation of vending stands and vending machines on property under their respective jurisdictions. 
(Ord. No. 6562 (1939), Sec. 3; amended by Ord. 191-99, File No. 990878, App. 7/1/99)

heading.catch_text: INSTALLATION OF VENDING STANDS AND MACHINES – EXCEPTIONS.
